summary: Playwright E2E Testing Setup for Web App Monorepo
UI Monorepo Architecture: Web, Admin, CLI Apps
UI Analyzer Agent: Playwright-Powered Web Interface Analysis
UI Analyzer: Playwright-Powered Web Interface Testing Agent

message.content:
I want to build a system within Neon that examine user's code, examine user's project DB schema and every week, handles them an email with things they should improve.
Like, not selecting a stupid JSON column that is causing a big bill or adding a stupid index... And then a simple apply button that creates a new branch and applys things there. 
Create a RFC with all things, like WHAT , WHY , HOW , END GOALS, and those kind of things. I also want this functionality to be analyze code and schema to be a single endpoint, so it can be easily added to MCP server. The cron job part should call this service in an async way.

content.text: I'll create a comprehensive RFC for this system. Let me start by creating a todo list to organize this task.
